sentences.english: In beginning, she didn't like Inuyasha.
sentences.chinese: 一開始，她不喜歡犬夜叉，。
尤其是日本動畫《犬夜叉》，《名偵探柯南》。

sentences.english: They call her the dragon lady because she is always yelling at children.
sentences.chinese: 他們把她叫做母夜叉，因爲她總是對着孩子大吼大叫。

sentences.english: She will wish to see you, Inuyasha.
sentences.chinese: 她會許願想見到你，犬夜叉。

sentences.english: Inuyasha and is discovered to be the reincarnation of Kikyo.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，她解除了犬夜叉的封印，並發現是桔梗轉世。

sentences.english: Kagome can hear Inuyasha's voice even though she can't see him.
sentences.chinese: 雖然看不到犬夜叉但戈薇聽到他的聲音。

sentences.english: Last November, Hermit Doctor and yaksha in Wat Phra Kaew, Bangkok.
sentences.chinese: 去年十一月，曼谷玉佛寺入口處的隱醫和夜叉。

sentences.english: The woman is an absolute dragon.
sentences.chinese: 那女人是十足的母夜叉。

sentences.english: Cinderella's step mother is a dragon .
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘的繼母是個母夜叉。

sentences.english: There she unseals Inuyasha and is discovered to be the reincarnation of Kikyo.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，她解除了犬夜叉的封印，並發現是桔梗轉世。

sentences.english: He met Kagome and Inuyasha when he was attempting to avenge the death of his father.
sentences.chinese: 他在試圖爲父親之死復仇時遇到了犬夜叉和戈薇。

sentences.english: Shootin´ fire from your mouth just like a dragon.

definition: demon in Buddhism/poltergeist in temple that plays tricks on monks and has a taste for their food
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
